attributes.action: To Create Affordable Housing Urgently for First Time buyers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Young people are being forced from the housing market by crippeling costs of house prices and interest rates. We ask the government to take urgent action on this issue by Building more houses, Creating more and less excluive schemes to aid young people into housing, give priority of housing to solvent young people.

This petition effects everybody. Young people, parents of young people / first time buyers, the future population of this country. Please sign.
